title: vandisidvare
sahitya:
vandisuvare danyaru


anupallavi

  namma indirApati gaTTa pILutalomme


caraNam 1    ondondu stOtradi ondondu mantradi ondondu nAmava nenevutta 
mandarOddharana nI kundade pUjisi vandisuva Anandadinda
    caraNam 2    biTTu lajjeya drSTisi nODuta viTTala viTTala ennuta mana muTTi 
mADuva bhakti stutiyinda aSTAngadali vandaneya mADuta
    caraNam 3    siri lakSmIpati sharaNAgataranu karuNisendu kara mugidu 
haruSa puLakadinda maredu dEhava purandara viTTalarAyana dEhakke
